EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Amer_BGA_East_Operators-Mechanics-Avionics_Webinar.Confirmation - EAST
EmailTemplate.subject: [Registration Confirmed] Virtual Honeywell Operator’s Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for registering for Virtual Honeywell Operator’s Conference - East Coast Region
To join the event, please log on to the webinar platform by clicking here <[[https://event.on24.com/wcc/r/2322881/68B917A7AF80E37738D6BBCECF5CE751]]>, fifteen minutes before the event starts.
Date: May 12, 2020 Time: 10:00 a.m. ET {{my.Add to Calendar}}
We look forward to meeting you online for this webinar.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Event Team
